fields.name: Validate Me
fields.description:
Originally the project was intended to a simple case of valid-ception, that is a validator which validates itself.

It quickly became a validator for all you HTML, CSS, Python and JavaScript.

fields.name: Flags
fields.description:
Flags was a test of using canvas JS to experiment with grid based rendering for testing and experimenting with tile based games.  

Flags also has a basic build your own level.  It is a project I would like to return to soon.
